text: René Felber (14 March 1933 – 18 October 2020) is a Swiss politician. He was a member of the Swiss Federal Council (1987–1993). In 1980/81, he was the floor leader of the Social Democratic Party in the Federal Parliament. He was elected to the Swiss Federal Council on 9 December 1987 as member of the Canton of Neuchâtel and for the Social Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:People from Biel/Bienne Category:People from the canton of Neuchâtel
title: René Felber
